settings.heading: Enhance your Tennis & Pickleball Experience
settings.description: Serious about your tennis? Track your progress, scout your opponents, find better local matches, and save money on events & tennis gear at a whole new level with Power.

custom_css: @media screen and (max-width: 749px) {.section-medium-title.section-title-large {font-size: 40px; line-height: 40px; padding: 0px 45px; } .section-medium-title.section-title-medium {font-size: 40px; line-height: 40px; padding: 0px 45px; }}

settings.title: Full ratings for everyone (e.g. 4.xx --> 4.76)
settings.text: Extra precise ratings allow you to gauge the level of anyone with match results.

settings.title: Enhanced player discovery
settings.text: Find local players at your level who would make great practice partners.

settings.title: Rating History & Results Analysis
settings.text: See results analyses, full rating history, best wins, 3-month trending UTR, and more (for yourself and all other players).

settings.title: Save on tournaments & leagues
settings.text: Receive $12 off every verified UTR event, and $5 off every verified UTR-P event.

settings.title: Power Perks
settings.text: Access partner perks and discounts. These include Tennis Warehouse (30%), Total Pickleball (30%), the UTR Shop (35%), Diadem (25%), WHOOP ($30), Prince (20%), and more.

settings.title: Monthly Metrics
settings.text: See your monthly activity metrics and local city, state, and age group rankings. Keep track of your activity and progress month to month.

settings.title: College Fit Tool
settings.text: Enter your UTR to get a list of college recommendations and see how you stack up in their line-ups.

settings.title: Create "hits" that others can register for
settings.text: You set the time, location, and price. Create a stripe account to collect payments.

settings.title: UTR markets you & your hits
settings.text: UTR Sports markets "hits" you've created + your paid hitter profile. Potential clients can then message you or register for "hits".
